javax.swing.plaf.synth

Class DefaultSynthStyleFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.synth.SynthStyleFactory
      • javax.swing.plaf.synth.DefaultSynthStyleFactory

  •  class DefaultSynthStyleFactory
extends SynthStyleFactory
    Factory used for obtaining styles. Supports associating a style based on the name of the component as returned by Component.getName(), and the Region associated with the JComponent. Lookup is done using regular expressions.
    Author:
    Scott Violet

      • mergeStyles

        private SynthStyle mergeStyles(List styles)
        Creates a single Style from the passed in styles. The passed in List is reverse sorted, that is the most recently added style found to match will be first.
